title: Bastion Guardian of Covington
description: A magical spell is hiding something very important about the animals that live around the pond.In the land of Brackenridge, during an age of wizards and warriors, the Frogs of Covington only know about their simple life around the pond. Kept in solitude, their human characteristics and way of life was never questioned.But when a beautiful sprite appears, and warns the frogs of a dark wizard and his evil snakes, Bastion must learn the truth about their past and fulfill his destiny as the guardian of Covington.Magic of the Frogs is the first in a series, and is geared for ages 6-10, but anyone who reads will enjoy this fairytale adventure.
author: J.J. Marro
